title: 【WorldPainter】求几个自定义笔刷
author: Enderman_Gmig_0
txt_content:
我看了http://tieba.baidu.com/p/3052779984?pn=1
想下载个笔刷，
这是他推荐给我们的笔刷：
Minecraft Worldpainter Custom Brushes DOWNLOAD Minecraft Project
http://www.planetminecraft.com/project/minecraft-worldpainter-custom-brushes-download/

Minecraft Worldpainter Custom Brushes DOWNLOAD Minecraft Project
http://www.planetminecraft.com/project/minecraft-worldpainter-custom-brushes-download/

可是一点download就跳转到一个图片上了，不知道怎么下载，求百度网盘{:10_528:}
